On Dec. 9, 1945, a truck swerved in front of Patton’s limo. It was driven by a corporal who then disappeared. Patton survived with a dislocation of vertebrae from Bazata’s weapon and was taken to a hospital in more distant Heidelberg rather than in nearby Mannheim. He was at first fitted with a neck brace that did more harm than good.

As Patton was recovering, he held a press conference and declared he was going home. Then, he was injected or poisoned in the hospital and died suddenly on Dec. 21, 1945. There is a backstory that NKVD agents got to him, but that wouldn’t have been necessary.

Bazata claimed that he knows who killed him, and that Patton was killed by a dose of cyanide in the hospital. No autopsy was done, which is highly suspicious. Bazata went on to say that he met an unidentified man whom he knew only as a “Pole” (Polish extraction), who was also ordered to kill Patton.

Several official reports were produced regarding the exact circumstances of the very strange traffic accident said to be responsible for his death, but all of these reports have completely disappeared from U.S. government files. The medical reports disappeared, and archival records are strangely scrubbed.

Weak link in story? Patton stopped en route at a Roman ruin located on a hill along the roadside. Bazata put a jam into the window of Patton’s auto that would leave a four inch gap for a shot to the target. There are very few images of the limo online and now no accident reports either. However this one is of interest. It shows a white colored object sticking out of the window, door area where Patton was seated. The window itself is blurry, but you can see some interior detail. Was this window indeed partially open- thus confirming Bazata’s claim?

Plenty of Motive for Assassination: Gen. Patton’s Interpretive Framework
Patton had planned to write his memoirs, illustrating that eastern Europe was tossed to the Soviet Union. The reason for the hit on Patton were his views put forth on Oct. 22, 1945, in a long letter to Maj. Gen. James G. Harbord. Once the powers that be realized Patton would retire and be outspoken, the plan was put into place. This “car accident” took place shortly before his scheduled departure home, and he had narrowly escaped death twice before under very strange circumstances.

In a letter, Patton had bitterly condemned the Morgenthau policy; Eisenhower’s pusillanimous behavior in the face of Jewish demands; the strong pro-Soviet bias in the press; and the politicization, corruption, degradation and the demoralization of the U.S. Army, from this bad policy. He saw this as a deliberate goal of America’s enemies.

I have been just as furious as you at the compilation of lies which the communist and Semitic elements of our government have leveled against me and practically every other commander. In my opinion it is a deliberate attempt to alienate the soldier vote from the commanders, because the communists know that soldiers are not communistic, and they fear what eleven million votes (of veterans) would do.

In his letter to Harbord, Patton also revealed his own plans to fight an “all-out offensive” against those who were destroying the morale and integrity of the Army and endangering America’s future by not opposing the growing Soviet might.

Today is the 155th anniversary of the conclusion of the Battle of Gettysburg, the bloodiest battle ever fought on American soil.

Let us all take some time today to reflect upon the lives lost in that terrible and unnecessary war.

Let us also reflect upon the fact that 155 years later we are still in the same situation.

One side of the nation wants one thing, the other side wants something completely different.

We had a compromise in this nation, that compromise was the Constitution, Bill of Rights, Freedom of Association, equality of State and Federal powers and the Rule of Law.

155 years later, half to the country still wishes to infringe upon this peaceful compromise and force the other half into submitting to the will of the tyrannical and politically radicalized misfit underclass.

Ironically enough, these tyrants still use the same justifications to demonize the productive and virtuous as "racist" and "oppressive".

When, as President Jefferson Davis said:

"All we ask is to be left alone!"

It is a shame how all of the error of the past is repeated, yet none of the wisdom.

Because so little of the wisdom was passed down, over a century and a half later, we will have to fight another bloody and unecessary war, all because these tyrants refuse to honor President Davis' simple request, a request that I believe we all share.

As we honor those who died on the fields of Gettysburg today, let us look to history for solutions.

Michael Tsarion once said: "History is synonymous with Truth".

Our forefathers left us an archive of wisdom for us to study and apply to our current situation because they knew what we seemed to have forgotten which is that Time is cyclical, not linear.

The problems we face now are the same as those faced in the past, only the dates and names have changed.

Tomorrow as we celebrate Independence Day, let us remember that 242 years later, we are still not yet free!

Thomas Jefferson's words are just as true today as they were in his day: 

"The price of Freedom is eternal vigilance."

Because we let our guard down and failed to learn the lessons of the past, we are back in the exact same situation we were in during 1776, and 1863, and 1933.

So the eternal struggle for Freedom continues...

Although we cannot change the past, we can learn from the lessons of the past. And although we are almost certainly too late to avoid another civil war, we are not too late to learn from the mistakes made in those wars so that we do not lose the war again.

We cannot afford to lose this time, the stakes are much too high.

We owe it to those who fought and died for us to ensure they did not perish in vain.

As we embark upon this crusade yet again, with our God, or Gods, as our defender may we develop the fortitude to defeat these tyrants and secure a future for our decendants.

UN Demands Brussels Ignore ‘Resistance’ to Mass Migration, Share Unlimited Arrivals Across Bloc 

The United Nations (UN) has demanded Brussels reform asylum rules, declaring that distributing asylum seekers equally throughout the bloc is “the only way” Europe can house every third world migrant who wants to make the continent their home.
Branding Italy’s decision to close its ports to a boat of 629 migrants “shameful”, UN refugee chief Filippo Grandi demanded European Union (EU) countries make it as easy as possible for open borders-backing NGOs to continue ferrying immigrants from Africa to Europe.

“It is shameful. As a European, I felt shame — shame — that there was a boat — there is a boat — in the Mediterranean, and for several days nobody wanted to take these people,” he said Wednesday, as the migrant-packed vessel rejected by Italy was on its way to Spain.

“I think that closing ports, whoever does it, threatens rescue at sea, as we have seen in the case of the Aquarius, and therefore is not the right solution,” he told Reuters journalists in Geneva.

“We have to have predictable arrangements so that rescue boats know where to go,” he added, warning that “otherwise, this [could be] a disincentive to rescue, [and] people may lose their lives if this doesn’t happen.”

Since migrant delivery NGOs stepped up their activities in the Mediterranean, over the past few years Italy has been burdened with approximately half a million illegal immigrants whose crime rate has been found to be significantly higher than that of native Italians, according to a study by Italy’s largest business association.

 “We need to listen” to Italy, Grandi said, stating that the nation’s populist government was “right to say” the nation cannot welcome every boat of third world migrants wishing to make Europe their home.

The High Commissioner for Refugees, an Italian himself, pronounced that the only solution is to let them all in and then give Brussels the power to distribute newcomers equally throughout the bloc.

“It’s very clear that Europe needs to reform its asylum system in a collective manner; there’s a lot of resistance to that but there’s no other way,” Grandi said.

While acknowledging that the controversial EU quota system — which would have seen illegal immigrants arriving in the bloc forced on unwilling nations — was “a failure”, the UN figure insisted: “Unless Europe goes back to this notion of sharing the burden, we will not get out of this situation.”

The decision of Italy’s populist new government to turn away the Aquarius ship, which is carrying migrants mostly from West Africa and Bangladesh, was on Tuesday denounced as “sickening” by French president Emmanuel Macron.

Previously, Breitbart London has reported how the globalist European leader has declared the EU is entering an “unprecedented” age of mass migration and said that “bombshell” population growth in Africa means the two continents’ destinies are bound.

The Nationalist Community finds itself in a rather similar situation to that of the Army of Northern Virginia.

We too are outnumbered, outflanked and outmaneuvered.

Most major cities are under Leftist control, we are unable to hold safe rallies, public office or even express our views without being fired from our jobs.

Our nations are being flooded with incompatible people from the third world who hate us and our government refuses to protect us from this invasion of hostiles.

We are becoming minorities in the nations founded by our ancestors and are being demoralized, poisoned, assaulted, imprisoned and spiritually raped.

Unfortunately, our movement is much more divided than the armies of the Confederacy. During the past year we have spent more time arguing amongst one another than with the enemy.

We had a great deal of success in our online efforts during the 2016 Presidential Election, however our momentum has waned and we are finding it difficult to gain ground online as we have been censored from most major platforms.

We need to take this largely online movement and take it into the IRL space but we are divided over how to do so.

Some want to resort to protest activism on hostile grounds, others want to kick off a hot war against the forces of evil, some want to run for the hills and regroup, some want to wait for Trump to fix everything and others want to vote our guys into office.

If we learn anything from Pickett's Charge it should be this:

If your enemy outnumbers you, out-positions you and has a strategic advantage over you, you should NOT attack them directly!

The Charlottesville Rally was a disaster because we went into enemy territory, outnumbered and with the whole local government, AntiFa, ADL/SPLC, media and political establishment against us.

Although our brave soldiers courageously marched into the fray against all odds, this was a strategic blunder that hurt us more in the long run than we could have possibly foreseen at the time.

A CVille 2.0 is a suicide mission, the enemy is still in control, we are still outnumbered and the government is still against us.

Waging a hot war is foolish at this time because we are outnumbered and hopelessly outgunned. The police and military view any Right Wing insurrection as a threat to the safety and security of our nation. We need to get them on our side via effective propaganda so that we can help each other take our country back from the forces of evil.

If you know me, you know how I feel about rallies in general: I am not a fan.

But consider this:

What if we held pro-White rallies in Conservative strongholds?

What if we were peaceful, presentable, friendly, welcoming and informative?

What if we invited locals to our rally and red-pilled them on Identity and the question of Race?

What if we used these rallies to truly "unite the Right" under a common cause?

What if these served as a catalyst to start organizing Right Wingers at the local level into building our own businesses, starting our own charities, clubs, preparedness groups and schools?

Wouldn't that be a better way of hurting the enemy long-term than attacking them head on and dying a martyr's death like General Armistead did during Pickett's Charge?

Unlike General Lee, we have other options, we can rally our troops, fortify our territories and make the Left fight on our terms!

It is not cowardly to retreat from unwinnable odds.

It is foolish to waste life unnecessarily for the sake of ones pride.

We lack the strength, numbers and organization to win though brute force.

We need to use finesse and coordination to achieve victory.

by Rudyard Kipling

It was not part of their blood,
It came to them very late,
With long arrears to make good,
When the Saxon began to hate.

They were not easily moved,
They were icy -- willing to wait
Till every count should be proved,
Ere the Saxon began to hate.

Their voices were even and low.
Their eyes were level and straight.
There was neither sign nor show
When the Saxon began to hate.

It was not preached to the crowd.
It was not taught by the state.
No man spoke it aloud
When the Saxon began to hate.

It was not suddenly bred.
It will not swiftly abate.
Through the chilled years ahead,
When Time shall count from the date
That the Saxon began to hate.

Movie Review: The Boer Project: South Africa, a Reversed Apartheid?

Yesterday I had the pleasure of attending the screening premier of activist Jonas Nilsson's new feature-length documentary, The Boer Project. I was honestly taken aback by how many people showed up: there were 100, 120 nationalists attending from all over Sweden. I shouldn't have been: Nilsson crowdfunded the project, raising about US10,000 to fund a trip for himself and a small production crew to the troubled country. This level of support was really a huge whitepill, and Nilsson did full justice to the faith they placed in him.

The Boer Project is assembled episodically, and is composed primarily of a series of interviews with White South Africans from all walks of life. Nilsson allows them to tell their stories, in their own words, with a minimum of editorialization. In the process what emerges is an outline of a disinherited people who are perched on the edge of a catastrophe that the outside world steadfastly refuses to acknowledge. The interviews include the wives of men murdered in farm attacks, and while, with a truly impressive stoicism, they refuse to cry on camera, you can see the crippling pain, trauma, and fear lurking just behind their eyes, threatening to take over at any moment. Another interview, with a man running a food distribution centre for several hundred Boer families who have been cast into grinding poverty due to the black regime's racist "affirmative action" policies, does result in tears, when Nilsson asks him how his people would find food if he wasn't there to distribute it, and the man answers simply, and heartbreakingly, that he does not know.

There is a man running an orphanage for children whose parents were murdered. Another is running a farming cooperative for Whites who have been rendered homeless and immersed in poverty (one quarter of the Boer population is currently living in "informal settlements" that are essentially refugee camps). He is of course called racist because he helps his own people. Other interviews are with farmers whose daily lives are lived under the looking shadow of farm attacks, some of which involve what are in essence paramilitary platoons armed with assault rifles. The president of the country's largest and oldest agricultural union explains the statistics of farm attacks, which the government stopped collecting over a decade ago, and which unambiguously show being a farmer in South Africa to be one of the world's most dangerous occupations. Simon Roche of the Suidlanders civil defense organization explains what his group is doing to prepare for the civil war he is sure is coming, and does not believe can be won. The film closes with interviews with two Swedish foreign ministers, who explain with disturbing satisfaction the important role that Sweden played in ending apartheid.

This is not a movie that was made for White Nationalists. It is from the Alt-Right, but it is not for the Alt-Right. The intent is to get the word out to ordinary people about what is happening in South Africa. The governments of the world pretend that genocide is not imminent, the global media refuses to acknowledge the situation, and so ordinary people simply. Do. Not. Know. The are ignorant of the scale of poverty, homelessness, despair, suffering, rape, murder, and injustice that has become the daily life of the Boer.

The Boer Project aims to change that.

Watch it.

Share it.

Don't let the world ignore this any longer.

By this time tomorrow night we will have a new addition to our fam!  My sister-in-law will be delivered of her second child, a boy.  Everyone is very excited, especially my little 3 year old niece who insisted I make her mama's favorite cake - German Chocolate Cake - so we can take it to the hospital and share it with my sis-in-law's dr and her nurses, along with fam.  I just finished putting the pecans on the topping! 

German Sweet Chocolate Cake 

1 pkg (4 oz)  Baker's German's Sweet Chocolate or other sweet baking chocolate
1/2 cup boiling water
1 cup butter 
2 cups sugar
4 egg yolks
1 teaspoon vanilla
2 1/2 cups sifted Swans Down Cake Flour

(You can use regular flour, but take out a couple of level tablespoons from the 2 1/2 cups. That should make it equal to cake flour.) 

1 teaspoon baking soda
1/2 teaspoon salt
1 cup buttermilk
4 egg whites, stiffly beaten

Prep:

Melt chocolate in boiling water. Cool. Cream butter and sugar until fluffy. Add yolks, 1 at a time, beating well after each. Blend in vanilla and chocolate. Sift flour with soda and salt; add alternately with buttermilk to chocolate mixture, beating after each addition until smooth.Fold in beaten whites.

Pour batter into three 8 or 9 inch layer pans, lined on bottoms with wax paper. 

(Set your pans on wax paper and mark around the bottom. Cut out the paper;  put a "dab" of shortening in the bottom of the pan to hold the paper and place wax paper in the pan.)

Bake at 350 degrees for 30 to 40 minutes. Cool. Frost tops with frosting recipe below.

Coconut Pecan Frosting

( My Oma taught me that  poking holes in middle of the unfrosted cake with a toothpick while it's still warm and adding  a layer of milk chocolate icing over the bottom half  and allowing it to cool before using the pecan icing and repeating this on the top half the same way and using the remaining milk chocolate to warm drizzle on the top and down the sides made for a nice design and, these first two steps makes for a very moist cake )

Combine 1 cup evaporated milk, 1 cup sugar, 3 slightly beaten egg yolks, 1/2 cup butter, 1 teaspoon vanilla. Cook and stir over medium heat until thickened - about 12 minutes.

Add 1 1/3 cups Baker's Angel Flake Coconut (or other brand of coconut) and 1 cup chopped pecans. Cool until thick enough to spread; beat occasionally.  Makes 2 1/2 cups.

THE WRATH OF THE AWAKENED SAXON
by Rudyard Kipling

It was not part of their blood,
It came to them very late,
With long arrears to make good,
When the Saxon began to hate.

They were not easily moved,
They were icy -- willing to wait
Till every count should be proved,
Ere the Saxon began to hate.

Their voices were even and low.
Their eyes were level and straight.
There was neither sign nor show
When the Saxon began to hate.

It was not preached to the crowd.
It was not taught by the state.
No man spoke it aloud
When the Saxon began to hate.

It was not suddently bred.
It will not swiftly abate.
Through the chilled years ahead,
When Time shall count from the date
That the Saxon began to hate.

We have reached a point in American politics where the divide between the population has become so wide that there is no more "working things out".

In the last 30 years there have been a handful of wedge issues that were used gain support for either party:

Immigration

Gun rights

Abortion

Gay marriage

Economic policy

Etc.

In the past, it wasn't a big deal to be friends with someone who held opposing beliefs on one of these issues, say immigration for instance, because it was more of a theoretical and abstract moral concept at the time. 

But now, we can see what immigration is doing to our country quite clearly.

We can see the impact of demographic shift right before our eyes so the consequences are real now. What used to be considered somewhat trivial wedge issues are now fundamental issues that will have an irreversible impact on the next decade in America.

And the Left views it in the same way, they are legitimately scared that Trump and all his Nazi supporters will round them all up and kill them. These people are more dedicated than ever to taking guns, opening borders and redistributing wealth.

With that having been said, the time for compromises with these people is over.

Now that the consequences are real for everyone, any compromise from either side will be unacceptable because these issues are now fundamental rather than abstract.

There is no "America for everyone", there is no "we all just need to get along", there is no "can't we all just come together as a nation?"

The reality is there are two ideologically OPPOSITE groups in America inhabiting the same space at the same time.

One loves America and all it stands for.

One hates America and all it stands for.

But each side thinks that America stands for different principles, fundamentally opposite principles.

How can a compromise between these two be reached?

How long can we pretend like everything is going to work itself out?

The only way to reduce the political tension and regain control of our country is a war.

A bloody, brutal and horrific war.

Tension requires a release, this isn't just a political phenomenon, it is a fundamental law of the Universe.

These cycles of peace, tension, conflict, release and reconciliation are inevitable and highly predictable.

The enemies of this nation, both foreign and domestic, will never stop until they are BEATEN INTO SUBMISSION.

One team wins, the other loses.

In America we have this ludicrous idea that all issues can be resolved peacefully.

We haven't had a war here on American soil in over 150 years and I think that has made people docile and pacifistic.

Meanwhile the rest of the world is having wars in their homelands every few decades.

Being that we have avoided the release of this political tension for so long, the result when it does come to a head is going to be catastrophic.

We tried to go against the grain for too long, but we can't overpower nature.

We are bound by the laws of the Universe, laws that are immutable and unyielding.

We have been able to avoid conflict for a while, but at what cost?

Every action has an equal and opposite reaction.

We can't have one half of the country going in one direction and the other half going in the other direction and not expect to split in two eventually.

We are already in the skirmish phase of this war, people have been killed on both sides and this will continue to escalate.

I wish it weren't so, I wish things could be resolved peacefully.

But that isn't how things work.

My advice to you all is to wake up to the fact that you are already in a war and start getting yourself into that mindset.

Because if you don't, the enemy will.

Blame Jews, blame bankers, blame Bilderberg, blame Soros, blame Masons, blame the Church, blame parenting, blame GMOs, blame the media, blame the Illuminati, blame the Democrats, blame the Republicans.

Blame everyone but yourself.

There's a variety of different ways we enslave ourselves:

Poor choices, lethargy, lack of impulse control, lack of discipline, poor diet, poor choices in friends, apathy, being a shitty parent, behaving irresponsibly, addiction to drugs and alcohol, addiction to toxic relationships, abnegating personal responsibility, unwillingness to change one's thoughts or actions, etc.

Ultimately there is precious little you or I can do as individuals to bring the establishment down, but you can make yourself into the best person you can be.

And by doing so you are increasing both your immunity to the psychological attacks of the establishment and you are increasing the power of any counter attacks and actions you take to fight against them.

It is important to expose these evil doers who are waging war against us, but that is only half of the battle.

My son in law is finally going to get a concealed weapons permit. My daughter, too. He said he read a comment from a presumed witness to the recent shooting in CA -- 12 presumably killed (I always assume false flag until I learn otherwise; I usually don't learn anything to make me think it's not a false flag). Yes, get a permit if you need one, and carry a fucking gun everywhere. Into bars. I do the few times I go in. I don't know if it's legal, and I don't give a fuck. I carry. I carry in my home. I have guns, loaded, chambered, around the house. No, I don't have little kids. If I did, they would know where they are, how to use them if needed, and not to ever mess with them unless needed. 

I grew up with lots of guns in the house. My dad collected military rifles. He always had a .38 snub nose in his nightstand. Loaded. We knew it was there. We went out shooting in the country -- then 30 or 40 miles, maybe, from home in Seattle. Now you'd have to go a bit further. Or to a shooting range. Hell, we never went to a shooting range. We went outside of the city. That was all. 

Get a gun if you don't have one. Carry. Get used to shooting it. Revolver. Semi-automatic. A shotgun. Be ready. Get the earbuds out of your ears while you're out and about. Be alert, 'situational awareness,' they call it. 

Never count on the police. Ever. They respond AFTER it's all happened, and who knows how long that will be. YOU are 'the first responder' in your life, and in the lives of those you live with, and those who are in your vicinity if something happens. Don't be helpless. Be ready to help if needed. Get involved if needed. Don't run like everybody else. Carry a fucking gun. Or two. Lots of folks carry a bigger caliber, and have a backup in their coat or pocket. A pocket .380, hell a .22 is fine. Defend your life and the lives of the ones you love. Don't beg for mercy and hope. Shoot the fuckers. 

There are going to be a lot more shootings. Get used to it. Most, if not all, are false flags. Staged. Pure acting. Assume false flag before wringing your hands over 'all these needless deaths.'

Get guns. And carry. Always. Everywhere.

She told me that she wanted to make love to me just once before I got married and committed my life to her sister. I was in total shock. The UK sent notice to Gab.ai to remove "specific posts on Gab that advocate ‘ritual death by torture’ and the ‘complete eradication’ of all Jews."

Gab responded by saying "take a walk." Gab is based out of the United States and not subject to UK laws.

In a statement to BuzzFeed News, a Microsoft spokesperson confirmed the request. According to Microsoft, the posts are incitements of violence that are both against Microsoft Azure's policies and not protected by the First Amendment.

Gab requested that he remove the posts voluntarily. Patrick initially stated he would remove them but failed to do so in a timely manner, so Gab removed them negating the showdown. BBC reported the removal on 10 Aug 2018. BBC commented that a day earlier a Gab user in the UK had been jailed for 16 months after calling for Muslims to be burnt on bonfires or gassed.

On 27 Aug 2018 Gab dropped Microsoft Azure and move to another cloud service provider. Numerous Gab users have commented that Gab loads quicker with the new provider.

With Twitter’s aggressive suspension of accounts, Gab has recently experienced rapid grow. After two years on the internet it now has more than 625,000 accounts, 100,000 in the last two weeks alone.

On 17 Aug 2017 Google removed Gab’s app from the Google Play Store for hate speech. Apple never authorized the Gab app on their platform.

In Sep 2017 Gab faced pressure from its domain registrar to take down a post by Daily Stormer founder Andrew Anglin.

I have a coal fired forge, I've used it lots of times to heat, bend, and shape steel. When it starts, the smoke is dense and opaque. After it gets hot enough to do work, the smoke is pretty clear. The smoke coming from the twin towers was thick black rolling smoke. The smoke of a fire that didn't have enough oxygen. There's no way that fire was hot enough to heat steel to even a cherry red, let alone an orange or yellow. It could have bent, had it been orange hot, which would require huge industrial fans blowing perfect up through all the other floors, into a liquid fuel which had by then ran down or soaked into its surroundings. A solid fuel consisting of stacked pieces allows upward BLOWN air to move between the pieces, which makes all the fuel burn at once. You can do that with coal, coke, charcoal briquets, or even chunks of hardwood, but not curtains, carpet, and concrete chunks. The towers could not have that arrangement at all, no way.
 Besides, with the impact on the plane, and the uneven heating of the fire, the fall would have been arbitrary, disorderly. The other steel would have held together, and it would TWIST as it went down. that fall was incredibly orderly. 
 I'm not buying any of it, not for one damn minute. There are pictures of other steel supported buildings which had very hot fires, and they didn't fall down.

Nancy Pelosi and her anti-gun team are either profoundly stupid or genuinely evil.

Although either answer is arguably correct, the latter most likely explains H.R. 8 -- a bill that is scheduled for a hearing this week in the House Judiciary Committee.

With H.R. 8, Pelosi and her gun-hating cronies have crafted a “Universal Background Check” bill with dozens of trap doors that could, if enforced to the letter, put millions of gun owners in prison.

Specifically, the bill outlaws the “transfer” of a firearm without a Brady Check. While this includes private sales, it by no means is limited to that. 

The term “transfer” is nowhere defined, but it’s clear from the bill that handing your gun to a neighbor for as little as one second is a “transfer” unless you’re covered by one of the bill’s so-called exceptions.

So if you show off your new gun to your neighbor in your living room, and hand it to him to look at, you’re a criminal, and can go to prison for up to a year under federal level.

But as onerous as this provision is, the worst part consists of the Universal Gun Registry the bill would create.

Under H.R. 8, since every gun transfer will go through a dealer, every gun owner will have a 4473. 

We know that the ATF, in connection with annual inspections conducted under federal law, is increasingly copying these forms to its database in a centrally accessible format. See examples here.

So here’s the problem: if everyone has a 4473, everyone is potentially in the database.

Even the Obama Administration recognized this in 2013, when a leaked memo from the Justice Department revealed its assessment of Universal Background Checks:
Effectiveness depends on the ability to reduce straw purchasing, requiring gun registration .... (Emphasis added.)

Regardless, gun grabbers today are trying to put a new spin on Universal Registration Checks. They claim that section 5(1) in the bill prohibits registration.

The problem is that the Firearm Owners Protection Act of 1986 CURRENTLY prohibits a national gun registry. And yet, the ATF is not interpreting that prohibition from preventing it from doing what it’s already doing. 

So if the current prohibition isn’t effective, why would anyone suppose that putting it in the law a second time would make any difference? 

Are we putting the ATF on double super-secret probation?

As I mentioned above, the House is now pushing this bill to the forefront.

So please send your Representative a pre-written letter OPPOSING H.R. 8.

If you call your Representative -- and want additional talking points -- you can go here to see GOA’s Fact Sheet on H.R. 8.

Thank you.

In Liberty,

Erich Pratt
 Executive Director

14 Years of the Jewish Republic

In the early days of May 1933, just about two months after the abortive Boycott of Jewish stores and businesses, the Nazi youth and Student organizations struck again.

They organized demonstrations in all the major universities, during which the "un-German" books and publications would be taken out of the libraries and ceremoniously burned.

This patriotic exercise of course had strong historical precedents. In 1517, Martin Luther had publicly burned the Papal bull excommunicating him, and had then proceeded to stage public burnings of Thomistic philosophy books, missals, papal decrees, and other symbols of the ancient church.

In 1817, on the three hundredth anniversary of Luther's bonfire, German university students, protesting the failure of a united Germany to appear following the defeat of Napoleon, met at Wartburg Castle, where Martin Luther had been hidden by his friends, and publicly burned books they found offensive to the German spirit.

Now, in May 1933, the German universities are once again purged of offensive books. This poster, advertising a book on the Weimar Republic, has a cover commemorating the burning of these books. Especially singled out for destruction were books by Jewish writers: Sigmund Freud, Albert Einstein, Stefan Zweig, and Erich Muhlsam. But the students enthusiastically destroyed copies of liberal and democratic authors, such as Erich Marie Remarque's pacifist All Quiet on the Western Front, and Thomas Mann's short stories.
